product_name: REI Merino Wool Light Hiking Quarter Socks - Women's - 2012 Seconds
long_description: The REI Merino Wool Mini Crew Light Hiking socks are a great fit for hiking and backpacking. Merino lambswool blended with nylon and a bit of spandex provides durability and dependable fit. Stretch nylon reinforces heels and toes for durability and comfort; arch bands add support. Uniquely formed toe area and Lin-Toe(R) ''no-feel'' seams keep socks smooth and nonirritating. Seconds; item has minor cosmetic imperfections that do not affect product performance.
short_description: The REI Merino Wool Mini Crew Light Hiking socks are a great fit for hiking and backpacking.
